results.text: For I know the plans I have for you, declares the Lord, plans for welfare and not for evil, to give you a future and a hope.
results.reason: This verse speaks directly to God's personal plans for you, offering hope and assurance.
results.reflection: Trust in God's good plans for your life.

results.text: I can do all this through him who gives me strength.
results.reason: This verse empowers you by highlighting reliance on God's strength.
results.reflection: Lean on God's strength in every situation.

results.text: So do not fear, for I am with you; do not be dismayed, for I am your God. I will strengthen you and help you; I will uphold you with my righteous right hand.
results.reason: A reassurance of God's presence and support specifically for you.
results.reflection: God's presence dispels fear and provides strength.

results.text: Come to me, all who labor and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest.
results.reason: Jesus personally invites you to find rest in Him.
results.reflection: Find peace and rest in Jesus amidst life's burdens.

results.text: And we know that in all things God works for the good of those who love him, who have been called according to his purpose.
results.reason: This verse assures you that God orchestrates everything for your good.
results.reflection: Trust that God is working for your good in all circumstances.
